1 teaspoon Italian herb seasoning,1/2 teaspoon salt,1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper,1/4 teaspoon granulated garlic,1/4 cup all-purpose flour,2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs,2 tablespoons unsalted butter,2 tablespoons olive oil,8 garlic cloves,,1 cup heavy cream,1 cup chicken broth,1 tablespoon fresh parsley, or as needed (optional),,
